name: A Stickman Hero Xtreme X3 - Streets Of Mayhem Edition
name_original: A Stickman Hero Xtreme X3 - Streets Of Mayhem Edition
description:
Get ready for all out A C T I O N !! In this fun game, you play one of three stickmen out to save a city. Choose from a biker or two types of skaters. The choice is yours! However, choose wisely, because the fate of the city is in your hands!

GAME FEATURES

- Easy tap controls.
- Cool graphics.
- Everything unlocked.
